trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de evento para o <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O objeto RoleManagerEventArgs fornece informações de evento para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento de <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventArgs object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto RoleManagerEventArgs fornece acesso para o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>da solicitação atual e um `Boolean` <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>propriedade é usada para habilitar ou cancelar a criação de uma <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>por<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*> property to the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs"> </xref> classe e define o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*>propriedade especificado <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.Context*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>objeto fornece informações de evento para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento de <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request, and a `Boolean`<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>objeto fornece acesso para o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>da solicitação atual e um `Boolean` <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>propriedade é usada para habilitar ou cancelar a criação de uma <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>por <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>objeto fornece informações de evento para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento de <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto fornece acesso para o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>da solicitação atual.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para a solicitação atual

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether role information has been applied to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as informações da função foi aplicadas ao usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: The RolesPopulated property is used to enable or cancel creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RolesPopulated é usada para habilitar ou cancelar a criação de uma <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>por <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: If set to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> assumes that role membership for the current user has been verified and any required role membership information has been set up for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Se definido como `true` no <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>assume essa associação de função para o usuário atual foi verificado e as necessárias informações de associação de função foi configuradas para o usuário atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: No action is taken by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> to create a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma ação será tomada pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>para criar um <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objeto para o usuário atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if role information has been applied to the current user; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as informações da função tem sido aplicadas ao usuário atual; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
